description:
I`m a LITTLE worried about my abs so I`m interested in this weight loss machine…it looks pretty good!  Whoa-Futaba!  Stop acting like a baby! T-That`s not a ride!  Enough, we`re going home! Man, I want one so bad…If I just had one of those I`d be sporting a 6-pack in no time, but economically, I just can`t swing it.  I`ll have to do it the old fashioned way…Wait!  Futaba, get down on all fours! It`s…it`s…!
Source: crunchyroll
